amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Education to prioritize community colleges located in areas with high unemployment rates when awarding grants for community college reform.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-256 to direct the Secretary of Education to prioritize community colleges located in areas with high unemployment rates when awarding grants for community college reform.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cardoza.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
